name: Dutchmakeupgirl
review: This is by far my favorite drugstore blush. I love that it also has a bit of sparkle in it so it can leave a little shimmer.

name: Angel15
review: Great color, goes on smooth. Have been buying for years. Always works

name: Tessa
review: Great color to add to natural skin tone

name: Tamara
review: I use this product daily.

name: none
review: With my fair skin it's hard to find the right color of blush. I prefer a natural look. Not too heavy

name: Kricket
review: Use daily.  Applies nicely

name: Amy W.
review: This blush is perfect for summer! It gives you a nice glow without going over the top---great especially for finishing up your contouring and bringing everything together to look natural.

name: ksfla
review: Nice shade, goes with different lipsticks and what you're wearing.

name: Mema
review: I use it every day,  blush

name: nomad
review: I've used it before and needed to replenish -- too pricy

name: g
review: Product too heavy

name: Liz
review: I would tell other people.

name: Astew
review: The color doesn't show up on my cheeks even after pressing hard in the color and blush brush.

name: HazelEyes
review: I have been sorta obsessed with experimenting with blushes lately. I tend to stick to a natural look and use bronzes daily but I chose to try this color and it is so beautiful and very pigmented. You only need a little to get a perfect color on your cheeks. Revlon blushes always tend to be so beautiful. Definitely obsessed!

name: tsmith
review: Blush is my favorite cosmetic.  I love to throw this one on before I go out the door, even if I'm just dressed like a tomboy.  It never goes on streaky or too strong.

name: On a budget
review: Is absorbed into the skin after a few hours and needs touch up

name: Brandy170
review: I love the blush color. It really compliments my skin color at an affordable price.

name: Minzy
review: I like it for its light, natural color.

name: Beauty
review: I wish Revlon would stop changing their blush and bronzing lines.  Each release seems lower quality than the last. And if you like a color you might be out of luck when and if you go to repurchase.

name: Shortenuff
review: I've only used it once, but it went on easy and I liked the color.

name: monik1560
review: I love

name: mountaingal
review: I love my Revlon Products. It's tried and true .

name: Pam
review: I like this coverage, you don't need much of this blush, just a few strokes, I'm sure this will last me a while.

name: none
review:
It's too orange on my skin and the powder crumbles and gets all over my clothes.
I had to go buy another brand.

name: Patti
review: Daily use

name: Ivana
review: Blusher put on in the morning goes on smoothly.

name: Abbey
review: I am extremely pale and struggle with finding blushes that look natural with good color and pigmentation. I'm super impressed with this blush and bought it on a whim, not really paying attention. Boy am I glad that I grabbed this blush, because it is now my go to color for any event.

name: Queen B
review: this product instantly started to deteriorate as soon as I began to use it. I will never get this again would suggest another bronzer.

name: Mary
review: This seems to be a good blush.

name: cupcake83115
review: This blush goes on really well and lasts all day, but it caused horrible  breakouts on both my cheeks! I bought this in "Oh, baby! Pink" and it was a beautiful color, just a shame it didn't work well for my skin.

name: Nana
review: I use it everyday when I apply my makeup. It is perfect for me.

name: Madditalian
review: Great coverage

name: Style in nc
review: This is my go to blush! I hope they never stop making this! I've searched and searched for a better blush at this price point and can't find one i like better! Even the more expensive blushes aren't as good for me!

name: Gucc
review: Lucky, bought it to replace a different brand/color, very happy with and will continue with.

name: par
review: The blush is fine once you can get to it, but trying to open the container every day is a chore. I have to use a nail file or a tweezers or a scissor to get pry it open.

name: Blush
review: Good price

name: jewels
review: Just enough color, great peachy hue, still looked natural.

name: jewels
review: Loved the gentle peachy hue, it was just enough color for contrast while looking natural.

name: ChihuahuaLover
review: These are easy my favorite drugstore blushes. I used Racy Rose (which I'm guessing is discontinued now) every day back in high school and I recently bought Dare to Bare. I think these are great for beginners in makeup, but still great for advance makeup users as well.

name: Jul
review: Brush that came with is too small.

name: The Magnificent Miss von Clef
review: Listen to the masses but guide your own way; cosmetic beauty is found within.

name: Makeup Mommy
review:
If you love blush like me, then Revlon isn't going to give you the POP of color you are looking for.
Its a very light powder and I was almost scrubbing my brush into it to see if any of it would stay on.
I ended up with Maybelline blush in a deep coral and that worked great for me.

name: Crisel
review: I always use revlon for my blush on, very natural looking and lasts all day! Also, you don't need to put a lot, only a few dabs and you're good to go.

name: Kathy
review: Goes on easy. The color compliments my skintone. I'm a redhead with green eyes.

name: Cim
review: great color

name: camper
review: This is a great blush for fair skin! It gives a great natural flush of color, if applied well. Since using it every day for the past few months, I have since gotten it for my sister because she loved it so much!

name: Luna
review: Bought this blush on a whim since it was on super sale. It doesn't work as a blush for my medium beige latina skin tone but it does work very nicely as a highlighter or when I just want a very natural hint of color. I have oily skin and it's quite long lasting (I use primer and setting powder). I also has a very pretty hint of shimmer.

name: Quin
review: I like this blush but i love the size of the pan

name: Lish
review: Great blush

name: silky's girl
review: I love that it looks so natural.

name: Steph
review: Love the color and it goes on well and stays on really like it

name: Natural and pretty style
review: This has nice, light coverage.  I do have to layer it a bit, but I guess I would rather do that than risk having a too heavy, clowning looking blush.

name: jillijill
review: I use this as a cover base then use a different blush on top/ blends in well with my skin tone

name: Goofy Gayle
review: Love it!

name: VM
review: Love how this blush has some gold glitter in it. I don't use highlights so this has some shimmer in it already which I like.

name: Ang
review: Color is a lot different when applied.

name: e
review: nice light color to highlight cheek bones for the summer!

name: Satisfied ULTA customer
review: I love the way Revlon Colorstay wears all day with no touch up, unless you're a perfectionist. I usually touch up slightly, because my phone headset rubs some off at the hairline. But probably not enough that a guy would notice.

name: G-Maa
review: The color was very nice, but the product has crumbled and cracked after only three days of use.

name: No
review: None

name: S.
review: The color is very rich and  appears the same on the face as in the package. Feels silky and weightless and blends effortlessly.

name: M
review: I usually purchase Revlon blushes: the color is good, they last all day, and they don't make me breakout

name: Dhipp
review: I love Revlon lip crayons so I decided to try their powder blush. So good! I got it in Haute Pink. It's nicely pigmented for a blush at this price point, but not so much to where it gives me unnatural coloring on my cheeks. As usual with drugstore blushes, I toss the given 'brush' and use my higher-end brushes to get a good application.

name: HeidiSusie
review: I was looking for a pretty coral blush, but I didn't want it to be too orange or too pink. This was perfect and I looked EVERYWHERE! I love the color. The only negative is that it's a bit messy. When you brush over the blush a lot of extra powder comes up that ends up making a mess and being wasted. Other than that, it's great!!

name: Erika23valentino
review: I use this product for my everyday natural work look. I definitly get compliments on my skin. My number one about this product is it goes on smooth.

name: Ingas Left Hand
review: Vibrant color without being unnatural, silky/shimmery finish, and a great bang for your buck!

name: Tiff
review: I just got this product i like it for everyday use

name: sami
review: i recently got this in 'mauvelous'. it's not super pigmented, but the color is still nice and it's not really shimmery. i like it. just make sure you have your own brush, because the brush it comes with is not good at all.

name: Dianne
review: Have used other Revlon blushes.  Trying new color.

name: KaseyRenee
review: In the package this color looks really bright, however, if blended lightly this blush looks beautiful on fair skin. Just right amount of shimmer. I have used name brand blushes before and this works just as well.  Save your money!

name: QtheB
review: This product give you just the touch of color you need.

name: Myrna
review: goes on smooth and love the color I chose

name: Michelle la belle
review: I love this blush because it's not so pink like so many blushes. It looks very natural. I use it everyday and love it

name: kat
review: NICE COLOR

name: Jeepster
review: I've used this blush for years.  Recently, Revlon changed the available colors, so I'm disappointed that I can't buy the one that I used for years.

name: Britney1241
review: Bought a great color. Easily to apply not heavy!

name: auntie j
review: Color not what I thought. Went on too light.

name: Sherry
review: I use the blush on my cheekbones and around my face which gives a brighter look to my face.

name: Halflotus
review: You can't tell that that you are wearing blush unless you put it on over and over.  Not worth the time and money.

name: Gem that Brooklyn girl
review: It's great it's just my personal preference that the color isn't what I thought this seems really dark but it's a great product

name: Bev.  the gardener
review:
The cost of the product is bearble, but wish it would go on sale
more often
Like the cssing it is in and size of container

name: Stacey Fox
review: This powder applies well. The color is fresh and it blends well with my foundation powder and my skin tone. It is one of my favorite blushes!
This blush is very pigmented so a little goes a long ways. I think this blush will last me awhile, glad I tried it! Next time I think I'll try one of the lighter shades.

name: Emily
review: I bought this to be an everyday running around blush and it works perfectly for that.  It is light and very natural looking.  I wouldn't use this for dramatic makeup or if I was going out, but everyday casual use it is great.

name: CS
review: Great color (fair skin), can use very little with getting a great effect - will last a long time .

name: Drea
review: I like this blush. It has a very good color for darker tones and it's buildable. The price is great too

name: Summergirl051
review: I always used to buy the pink and mauve blushes, but they never complimented my skin, and overall look. I tried this orange blush, and it goes perfectly with my fair to medium skin. I have mild acne, and the redness of it sometimes pick through, so a pink blush never looked good on me. But this orange blush changed my views on applying blush. Love it!

name: Sadie S
review: I never leave the house without blush on so I've tried a variety of different brands and types. This is highly pigmented and I love it! A little goes a long way! The little brush even does pretty decently if you're traveling and don't have room for all your brushes. I like the color a lot and I really want to try the other colors!
